entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High 6. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 7 April 2023
